com.paypal.paypalretailsdk

Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • PayPalRetailObject
      • com.paypal.paypalretailsdk.Invoice
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvoiceTemplate, RetailInvoice

    public class Invoice
extends PayPalRetailObject
    Invoice is the fundamental transaction record for retail payments. It contains header data, such as buyer and seller information and line items with unit prices, quantities, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Invoice.CancelledCallback 
      static interface  Invoice.DeletedCallback 
      static interface  Invoice.GotDetailsCallback 
      static interface  Invoice.PaidCallback 
      static interface  Invoice.RefundedCallback 
      static interface  Invoice.RemindedCallback 
      static interface  Invoice.SavedCallback
      After an attempt has been made to save your invoice to the PayPal servers, the completion handler will be called with the error (if any, or null if not) and the invoice object will be updated appropriately.
      static interface  Invoice.SentCallback
      After an attempt has been made to send your invoice, the completion handler will be called with the error (if any, or null if not) and the invoice object will be updated appropriately.

      • getHasDetails

        public java.lang.Boolean getHasDetails()
        If false, this invoice doesn't know what items are in its item list. This can happen when only "summary" information has been fetched from the server (typically as the result of a search). You can get the total, but items and subtotals totals aren't available until you call getDetails. @readonly

      • addItem

        public InvoiceItem addItem(java.lang.String name,
                           java.math.BigDecimal quantity,
                           java.math.BigDecimal unitPrice,
                           java.lang.Integer itemId,
                           java.lang.String detailId)
        Adds the specified item to the invoice. If there is an existing matching item on the invoice, we will increment the quantity by the quantity argument. You may pass a negative quantity value to decrement the quantity of an existing item.

      • addInvoiceItem

        public InvoiceItem addInvoiceItem(InvoiceItem item)
        Adds the specified item to the invoice. If there is an existing matching item on the invoice, we will increment the quantity of the item.

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.Boolean shouldNotifyMerchant,
                 Invoice.SentCallback callback)
        Send the invoice. It must have already been saved to the server.

      • deleteFromServer

        public void deleteFromServer(Invoice.DeletedCallback callback)
        Delete the invoice from the server. It must have already been saved to the server.

      • remind

        public void remind(InvoiceNotification notification,
                   Invoice.RemindedCallback callback)
        Send a reminder about this invoice to its intended recipient

      • cancel

        public void cancel(InvoiceNotification notification,
                   Invoice.CancelledCallback callback)
        Cancel this invoice

      • recordPayment

        public void recordPayment(InvoicePayment paymentInfo,
                          Invoice.PaidCallback callback)

      • recordRefund

        public void recordRefund(InvoiceRefund refundInfo,
                         Invoice.PaidCallback callback)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representing the serialized state of the Invoice object
